attributes.additional_details:
We are campaigning for in-home care providers to receive a minimum of £15.75 per hour from all local authorities and the NHS to enable providers to comply with the National Minimum Wage.

We want to achieve the highest standards of care for vulnerable adults and the elderly.

We want Carers to be valued and rewarded properly for the great work they do.

We want to ensure the same standards of in-home care for all, no matter where you live or whether your care is funded by the local authority or paid for privately.
